ValidationRule.description: This validation rule will fire when status picklist is in "Closed". This is created in custom_case object for Task dated on 10-12-2020
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Status__c ,"Closed"), OR ( LEN( Text_Field_1__c )=0, LEN( Text_Field_2__c )=0, LEN( Text_Field_3__c )=0, Check_box_1__c = FALSE, Check_box_2__c = FALSE, Check_box_3__c = FALSE) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter values for Text field 1;Text field 2 ;Text field 3 ;check box 1;check box 2 and check box 3
